snippet.title: Greedventory - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Greedventory is a gorgeous pixel-art narrative RPG experience, where the only thing standing between you and an embarrassingly swift death is your mouse. Strike, parry, and cast powerful spells on your enemies, loot increasingly magnificent treasures and equipment, get lost in a beautifully brutal world, take down a centuries old not-so-secret society, and become the hero you REALLY don’t want to be!

Wishlist Greedventory on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1895820/
